Posts.Content: Dec 11, 2010 12:57PM Blah2 wrote: If she is a religious person. PRAYERS !!  I was very touched when so many people told me they were praying for me.  I actually felt those prayers ! Thinking of you cards... I am here... call me anytime.... just keep in touch.  One person sent me a card every single week for a couple of months.  I still have a box of cards, letters etc.  I looked at them often.  Everyone is different, but I will say I got very sick of pink ribbon stuff so maybe avoid that.

Posts.Content: Dec 12, 2010 06:50PM Blah2 wrote: Yes, sometimes it is hard to be around a friend who is very ill.  Also, I had people stopping by and really didn't feel like having company on certain days. Lisa had great ideas.  Something specific instead of "call me if you need anything"  Keep us posted
